titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: DEATH CAUSE RECORDED TEXT (DUE TO CONDITION) - Description

div.p: DEATH CAUSE RECORDED TEXT (DUE TO CONDITION) is the same as attribute PERSON OBSERVATION TEXT STRING.
DEATH CAUSE RECORDED TEXT (DUE TO CONDITION) is the 'other disease or condition, if any, leading to the DEATH CAUSE ICD CODE (IMMEDIATE CONDITION)' as recorded on the death certificate.
